name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Resurgence Pack
name_original: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Resurgence Pack
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Resurgence Pack is an action-shooter game developed by Infinity Ward. It came out on 03-06-2010. It was published by Activision Blizzard. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Resurgence Pack is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
